New Records: Anthony Edwards tied Anthony Davis for 15th place in career 30-point games among players under 23
Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards scored 13 of his 33 points in the fourth quarter to extend the lead from a single point to 17 in five minutes
Post-Match Reflections: Rudy Gobert praised Anthony Edwards' improvement, noting his enhanced playmaking and ability to make bounce passes and lobs
Anthony Edwards expressed a desire to avoid being a team that reaches the playoffs and Western Conference Finals without winning a championship
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Timberwolves traded for Julius Randle and Karl-Anthony Towns to complement Anthony Edwards, who is now a key player for the team
